name: bit-voyage
description: Send your bits on a voyage.
author: Eric Mill

scripts.compile: browserify -r ./assets/js/utils.js -r filereader-stream -r qs -r aws-sdk -r ./assets/js/drop.js -r s3-upload-stream > assets/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -r ./assets/js/utils.js -r filereader-stream -r qs -r aws-sdk -r ./assets/js/drop.js -r s3-upload-stream -o assets/js/bundle.js
